title: NEW MAHENDRA TEA FACTORY ESTABLISHES EQUAL ALL TIME RECORD  PRICE FOR PEK GRADE
body_lines: An equal all-time record price of Rs.2,750.00 per kg was recorded in the low grown category PEK grade manufactured by New Mahendra Tea Factory situated in Matara, at this week’s e- Auction held on 13 th /15 th June 2022. This is an excellent achievement for which we offer our best wishes to the team New Mahendra Tea Factory.

New Mahendra Tea Factory is owned by Mr.Rumesh Haththotuwa and it is managed by M/s Senta Group of Company. The team at New Mahendra continue to consistently produce high quality teas enabling them to obtain attractive prices at the Colombo tea auctions.
This line was purchased by M/s Ceyem Commodities (Pvt) Ltd and Bartleet Produce Marketing (Pvt) Ltd are the tea brokers marketing the produce.
